bibl.title: Three Notes on Byzantine Documents.
bibl.note: 1. The Consular Date of P. Oxy. LIX 3987. - 2. An Unrecognized Oxyrhynchite Era Dating. P. Yale Inv. 499 [ed.: Susan A. STEPHENS, An Epicrisis Return and other Documentary Fragments from the Yale Collection, ZPE 96 (1993) p. 223]. - 3. P. Harris I 131. Letter of instructions from an official to a bibliophylax of public records, concerning the registration of a petition. July-August, 324.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S. and Klaas A. WORP, Three Notes on Byzantine Documents.
145.4 P. Harris I, 131 P. Oxy. LIX, 3987 P. Yale Inv. 499
